author: contigo
title: Bia Miranda faz dancinha com médica antes do parto na maternidade
text:
Bia Miranda faz dancinha com médica antes do parto na maternidade
Prestes a dar à luz, Bia Miranda faz dancinha com médica na maternidade e choca seguidores nas redes sociais
Na manhã desta quarta-feira (23), Bia Miranda surpreendeu os seguidores ao anunciar que sua bolsa havia estourado aos oito meses de gestação. A influenciadora digital deu entrada em uma maternidade no Rio de Janeiro, onde aguarda o nascimento de sua segunda filha, Maysha, fruto do relacionamento com o influenciador Gato Preto. A notícia foi compartilhada nos stories do Instagram, com a influenciadora visivelmente emocionada: "Gente, a bolsa estourou. Estou sem reação, a gente está indo pro hospital", contou, enquanto se dirigia ao local.
Já na maternidade, Bia apareceu mais tranquila e continuou atualizando os fãs sobre o andamento do trabalho de parto. Ela revelou que, até aquele momento, ainda não sentia dores e mostrou o roupão hospitalar que estava prestes a vestir. "O médico vai vir aqui pra me ver, e eu vou colocar isso aqui", disse, demonstrando leveza mesmo em meio ao nervosismo da espera. A influenciadora também contou que estava com cinco centímetros de dilatação, sinal de que o parto se aproximava.
Demonstrando bom humor e descontração mesmo em meio a um momento tão marcante, Bia apareceu dançando ao lado da obstetra responsável por seu parto. As duas se divertiram ao som de "Eu Sei Que Tu Me Odeia", de
Anitta. O vídeo, compartilhado nas redes sociais, fez sucesso entre os seguidores, que elogiaram a energia positiva da influenciadora nesse momento delicado.
Apesar da serenidade, Bia admitiu que não esperava que Maysha viesse ao mundo antes do tempo previsto. "Como eu não esperava a Maysha nascer agora de oito meses, eu não tenho um videomaker pra gravar lá o parto", explicou. Ela também contou que os preparativos ainda estavam em andamento: "A bolsa dela que eu mandei fazer não chegou. Tá pra chegar. Ia chegar esse mês", lamentou. A surpresa foi tanta que a influenciadora relatou, com bom humor, que "não para de sair água".
Maysha será a segunda filha de Bia Miranda, que já é mãe de Kaleb, de apenas 10 meses, fruto de seu relacionamento anterior com DJ Buarque.
Ver essa foto no Instagram

author: Get News
title: Studio Khora: Reinventing Long Island’s Landscape with Sustainable Elegance | User | bigspringherald.com
text:
Nestled amidst the emerald embrace of Long Island, Studio Khora rises as an exemplar of architectural alchemy, transforming modernist tenets into contemporary masterpieces.
The Pavilion house is a beacon of sustainable living, mirrors the ethos of top Long Island architects , marrying innovation with environmental stewardship. In an age where sustainability is not just a choice but a necessity, Studio Khora's design is a clarion call for the future of New York and Long Island's residential landscape.
Studio Khora, distinguished among Long Island architects, has sculpted a space that resonates with Mies van der Rohe's minimalist spirit while speaking the complex visual language of Derrida's deconstruction. Here, form and function engage in a delicate dance, creating a living experience that transcends the confines of traditional architecture.
This house is not a mere dwelling but a vessel of light and air, a canvas where nature's palette unfurls in splendor. The architectural language of this Long Island jewel is a dialogue of contrasts, where Mies’s transparent simplicity meets the intricate layers of Derrida's philosophy.
Studio Khora has adeptly translated these dialogues into a home that stands as a manifesto of fluidity, with glass expanses inviting the outside in, fostering a seamless bond with the land. In this space, contemplation and connection flourish, nurtured by the tranquil cadence of coastal life.
The narrative crafted by Studio Khora goes beyond aesthetic allure; it's an urgent response to the climatic challenges facing New York and Long Island. The house's sustainable blueprint is a testament to the firm's commitment to ecological integrity, featuring renewable resources, energy-efficient solutions, and a symbiotic relationship with its environment.
This approach not only minimizes the ecological footprint but also sets a benchmark for comfort and elegance. In this Long Island haven, sustainability is not an afterthought but the cornerstone of its creation. Studio Khora has reimagined the essence of coastal living, proving that luxury and environmental consciousness can coexist. The house's design is a bold step towards a greener, more resilient New York, where each structure not only shelters but also preserves and inspires.
ABOUT STUDIO KHORA
[ STUDIO KHORA ] is a multidisciplinary design collaborative of visionary architects, lighting and interior designers, landscape architects, and builders engaged to deconstruct the traditional patterns of spatial design. To see forward. We work as one with the most discerning residential and commercial clientele to sculpt contemporary architecture, interiors, furnishings, and landscapes within the world’s most extraordinary coastal settings. ​ Together, we seek to re-envision architecture as contemporary art.

author: VNExplorer
title: Le Cap-Vert bat le Mozambique et se qualifie pour les huitièmes de finale de la CAN
text:
La joie de Kevin Pina, buteur avec le Cap-Vert contre le Mozambique, ce vendredi. (AFP)
Déjà vainqueur du Ghana (2-1) pour son entrée dans la CAN, le Cap-Vert est facilement venu à bout du Mozambique ce vendredi, avec notamment deux frappes assez sensationnelles (3-0). Les Requins Bleus sont les premiers à se qualifier pour les huitièmes de finale et sont assurés de la première place du groupe B.
Le Cap-Vert est bien parti pour être l’une des sensations de cette CAN 2024. Cinq jours après avoir battu le Ghana, à la surprise générale (2-1), les Requins bleus se sont imposés avec autorité ce vendredi contre le Mozambique (3-0). Il est encore tôt pour savoir si la sélection menée par l’ancien Lillois Ryan Mendes pourra faire aussi bien que son quart de finale record en 2013 un an après avoir disputé la première CAN de son histoire, mais elle a largement dominé l’équipe mozambicaine et marqué des buts assez mémorables.
La bévue mozambicaine
Le premier est l’oeuvre de Bebé, très facile sur coups de pied arrêtés. L’attaquant du Rayo Vallecano avait trouvé une première fois la barre sur un coup franc surpuissant de trente-cinq mètres (24e) et c’est de la même manière qu’il a ouvert le score à la 32e. Son tir flottant a surpris Ernan, le gardien mozambicain, vraiment pas clair sur son intervention. Si les Capverdiens se sont fait peur en croyant concéder un penalty (40e), annulé après recours au VAR, ils ont pris deux buts d’avance sur une énorme bévue adverse, quand Edmilson Dove, seul devant son gardien, s’est fait chiper le ballon par Ryan Mendes à l’entrée de la surface. Le capitaine capverdien a ensuite ajusté facilement le gardien (51e).
Puis ce fut au tour de Kevin Pina de se mettre en valeur. D’une lourde frappe croisée à vingt-cinq mètres, le milieu a marqué le troisième but de son équipe (69e), injouable ce vendredi, pour le plus grand bonheur de Ronisia, la célèbre chanteuse franco-capverdienne présente en tribune.
Grâce à cette deuxième victoire, le Cap-Vert pourra même se permettre de faire tourner son équipe lundi face à l’Égypte, puisqu’il est assuré de terminer premier du groupe B au lendemain du nul entre les Pharaons et le Ghana (2-2).

author: Alli Rosenbloom, CNN
title: Emma Heming marks 16 years with Bruce Willis in candid message: 'Anniversaries are hard'
text: Emma Heming marks 16 years with Bruce Willis in candid message: ‘Anniversaries are hard’ Bruce Willis and his wife [Emma Heming](https://www.cnn.com/2023/11/15/entertainment/bruce-willis-wife-emma-caregiving/index.html) are celebrating their "sweet 16." On Wednesday, Heming celebrated the couple's 16-year anniversary by [sharing](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1XMGLmLjqd/?hl=en&img_index=1) a photo of herself kissing Willis's cheek on her Instagram page, writing in the caption, "16 years with this special man. My love and adoration for him only grows." Video above: Emma Heming Willis 'not good' amid husband Bruce Willis' dementia battle The couple wed in 2009 and share two daughters together, Mabel and Evelyn. Heming also posted a vulnerable message to her ["Die Hard"](https://www.cnn.com/2023/12/24/entertainment/peter-billingsley-die-hard-christmas/index.html) actor's [health issues](https://www.cnn.com/2023/10/12/entertainment/bruce-willis-moonlighting-creator/index.html), sharing in the video that she "was able to have a good cry" with a close friend. "It is really important to be able to have someone that you can trust with your feelings instead of just bottling them up and putting your best foot forward and just kind of soldiering through stuff, which I have a tendency to do," Heming said in the video. In February, Willis's family – including Heming, ex-wife Demi Moore and his daughters – [announced](https://www.cnn.com/2023/02/16/entertainment/bruce-willis-dementia/index.html) that the actor has been diagnosed with a form of dementia called frontotemporal dementia, or [FTD](https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/frontotemporal-dementia/symptoms-causes/syc-20354737) for short. Heming, who has been open about her journey as Willis's primary caretaker on her social media ever since, said in her video this week that "holidays are hard, anniversaries are hard." She added that "building a community and connection" has helped her get through it this year. "That has been my lifeline and I just want to thank you for that," she said. Heming wrote in the caption to her Instagram video about receiving "countless messages of love and support because Bruce is so beloved," and that these messages help her feel "less alone." "I wish I could answer all the messages because they are deep, raw and poetic but please know that I appreciate them so very much," she wrote. "I am grateful to you."
